CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 20, 1958, pg. A20, reads: "Renee's Dance Teachers - Additional members of the faculty of Renee's Dance Studio are shown at the grand opening in the Terrace Room of the Terrace Hall Hotel, 2337 Centre Ave., last Sunday.  Left to right: Ralph Proctor, instructor in ballroom dancing; Betty Dunson, modern dancing; Alberta Thompson, interpretive dancing; Sara Burney, interpretive dancing, and Rudolph Moses, tap and ballroom.  The studio is open now for reservations.  Call ATlantic 1-1171 or MA 1-8890 for information. - Harris Photo. - Adv."Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 20, 1958, pg. 11, reads: "Grand Opening at Renee's - Shown are members of the faculty of Renee's Dance Studio at their grand opening last Sunday in beautiful Terrace Room of the Terrace Hall Hotel, 2337 Centre Ave....  Guests at the grand opening were treated to food and refreshment, plus a floor show, featuring Lois (Shorts) Davis, Rudolph Moses, Sara Burney and others.  The management received a bevy of greeting via telegrams and flowers.  For information, call ATlantic 1-1171 or MAyflower 1-8870. - Harris Photo. - Adv."
TitMainTitle: Dance instructors Ralph Proctor, Betty Dunson, Alberta Thompson, Sara Burney, and Rudolph Moses posed in Terrace Room of Terrace Hall Hotel, 2337 Centre Avenue, for opening of Renee's Dance Studio
